<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82935</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82935</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15610</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">I nostri valori comuni</string>
            <string language="en">Our Common Values</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unsere Common-Werte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nos Valeurs de Terrain communal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nossos Valores Da Terra comum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι κοινές τιμές μας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nuestros Valores Del Campo común</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Analizzare  i valori presentati dagli insegnanti myEurope di diversi paesi. Non importa da dove veniamo, i valori sono universali e indispensabili per vivere nella società.</string>
            <string language="en">Exploring the values presented by myEUROPE teachers from different countries. No matter where we come from, values are universal and indispensable for living in society.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Erforschen der Werte stellte sich durch 
myEUROPE Lehrer aus unterschiedlichen Ländern dar. Egal wo wir 
von kommen, sind Werte allgemeinhin und Indispensable für das Leben 
in der Gesellschaft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorer les valeurs a présenté par des 
professeurs de myEUROPE de différents pays. N'importe où nous 
venons de, les valeurs sont universelles et nécessaire pour vivre 
dans la société.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorar os valores apresentou-se por professores 
do myEUROPE dos países diferentes. Não importa onde nós vimos
de, os valores são universais e indispensable para viver na 
sociedade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνώντας τις τιμές που παρουσιάζονται από τους 
δασκάλους myEUROPE από τις διαφορετικές χώρες. 
Οπουδήποτε και να προερχόμαστε από, οι τιμές είναι 
καθολικές και αναπόφευκτες για τη διαβίωση στην κοινωνία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorar los valores presentó por los profesores 
del myEUROPE de diversos países. No importa dónde venimos de, 
los valores son universales e indispensable para vivir en sociedad.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Fonseca;Isabel ;;;
FN:Isabel  Fonseca
ORG:EBI c/ JI Sophia de Mello Breyner
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15610</entry>
          </identifier>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

ORG:

END:VCARD</entity>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

FN:Fiorenza Congedo
ORG:
END:VCARD</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2007-10-05</dateTime>

          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>higher education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-16</string>
            <string language="en">12-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">I valori possono essere illustrati nello stimolare esempi da parte degli alunni. Situazioni di role-play possono essere create dagli alunni. Ogni valore può essere illustrato.</string>
            <string language="en">The Values can be explored while elliciting examples from students. 
Role-play situations can be made up by students.
Each value can be illustrated.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc"><rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"><Work rdf:about=""><license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/" /></Work><License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/"><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/DerivativeWorks" /><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice" /></License></rdf:RDF></string>
          </description>
        </rights>

          </purpose>
